schemeToThemeCheck.name: schemeToThemeCheck
schemeToThemeCheck.value:
("userCurrentTheme"."colorScheme" IS 'system' AND "userCurrentTheme"."lightThemeId" IS NOT NULL AND "userCurrentTheme"."darkThemeId" IS NOT NULL) OR
        ("userCurrentTheme"."colorScheme" IS 'light' AND "userCurrentTheme"."lightThemeId" IS NOT NULL AND "userCurrentTheme"."darkThemeId" IS NULL) OR
        ("userCurrentTheme"."colorScheme" IS 'dark' AND "userCurrentTheme"."lightThemeId" IS NULL AND "userCurrentTheme"."darkThemeId" IS NOT NULL)
